twitch_info.title: I wanna kill the kamilia 3 v2.02 - The Journey to 100% (Beaten K3 v1.50 100%)

message.body: Hey eradem, GL
God, forgot how loud your stream is lol
ty! :D
and lmao
I prefer having it loud so people can decrease it rather than have it quiet and it being really hard to make it loud enough to hear
but also K3 is just very loud in general
have it through my speakers immersing me the whole time lol
when you first boot up K3 it screams at you
but I welcome the screaming
LUL
since we're in my rough predicted clear range, it could happen today
bear in mind it was an estimate based on my improvement versus how GTC originally took me
it could take around the same 42 hours potentially
so rn I'm in the "might beat" rather than getting close lol
I did the first super f in jtool seven times in a row successfully btw
I found out my problem
I wasn't committing to the jump
I was too afraid I'd die to it lol
ofc I may still die to it but it's better to not be afraid and have higher consistency
see it worked just I forgot to fall down after lmao
RIP :(
it was my lack of commitment that made it so hard before
It is clear I am constantly improving tho
also the middle section I did a bit of practice on today, I figured out my issue with it in runs
but it's tight to do right regardless
basically I had the wrong setup for the m jump
but I got it now
though it does mean doing a jump on same frame which is annoying
dying to something I usually don't die to often is funny
today is clearly not a good day for getting past bottom right lmao
my consistency for it has mysteriously reached 0
why lol
Oof
I just can't do bottom right trap anymore
no matter what I do I fail it atm
How many times have you died by jumping too late in this drought?
it's not that, it's actually due to bonking at the wrong spots of the jump
if you bonk on the wrong spots you fall into the spike directly rather than enter the gap
Yeah that's what I mean
probably 20 times now tbh
this never happens and I'm doing the same setup I always do
so I'm clearly messing up like by a few pixels of movement or something on the let go of hold right
If you're hitting the up spike much more frequently than you are succeeding/hitting the side spike above you, you're jumping too early
oh no
I'm hitting the bottom spike
my deaths have been the bottom spike
That's what I meant by up spike (now realizing "up spike" is a bad way to refer to the up facing spike that's below you...)
lmao
by jumping too early you mean bonking on the wrong spot since I always bonk it
it's what I already said
Yeah, you're consistently bonking too early.
yeah
I mean the fact I'm getting there super frequently is amazing
that usually doesn't happen lol
This is crazy consistency to that point, lol
it is lmao
RIP, GG on another attempt though
I did do 7 super fs successfully in a row on the first super f in jtool today
so my consistency is very insane in strange ways tonight
Also I didn't realize you were stopping a bit before bonking right, I thought you just held right and pressed shift at the right time
maybe that would be easier?
nah defo not
From testing in jtool it's at least a 2 frame window, so it's the same precision as a block jump
oml
GL
I think you're right that holding and timing jump is better
If it becomes a problem again, you could also numpad cancel to make it ez, tricky to work your hands around so it'd require practice for sure though.
I've done the numpad before but it wasn't consistent enough
that's why I moved to the bonk
now at the 34 hours but I'm feeling a lot better at this
so close to getting the crystal holy shit
RIIIIIIIIIIIP
@Eradem I did it it like 5-6x in practice, maybe I'm doing it differently?
I even had to use the backup stutter strat
K3 acts slightly different to jtool in physics, sometimes it doesn't quite correlate exactly
but that was in v1.50
maybe it's better now lool
I only really noticed that difference when doing secret 5
2.0 only changed the input delay due to gm8.2
ahhhhh
also hi best of luck zoinkg1ZoinkWave
ty! :D
genesi2Cool  gl
I will have an afk soon, but so far this has been going good overall consistency wise
ty genesis :D
pb
my pb is the final super f with the crystal
puroloBanit genesi2Cool
been there like
been at the final super fs like 3-4 times with the crystal iirc
it's dumb lol
34 hours in rn
I guess that's an average of a crystal at super fs every 10 hours atm lol
i mean they are hard
thereis some good news
I did the first super f in jtool 7 times in a row successfully today
and sometimes I randomly first try it in real runs as you saw
oke oke
getting the flow for sure
ye
It's honestly really nice not to be always stuck at top half of the screen for most of the grind now
at least I get lots of attempts to bottom right
yea every attempt after the drop is nice
yee
4 frame :(
ikr
the fun part of this save is after the drop imo
brb for a bit as usual :D
it been so long kinda wanna go back also trying it :D
I gtg now, GL eradem! :D /
Thanks for streaming!
gl CoolCat
bk! :D
ty CoolCat
jaycAmazing jaycGL
ty! :D
5 raiders from lolkira24 have joined!
daaaang
NOOO
NOOOOOOOOO
ty for raid :D
NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO
FUCK
WAS THAT IT???
that would've been it
NotLikeThis NotLikeThis
brooo you were so close
that's my 4th death to super fs, and my second fail after reaching final super f
*with crystal
more consistent than last time no?
last time i think you grabbed crystal once or twice in 4 hours
yee far more consistent XD
last time i joined i mean
yeah since last time you joined my consistency is much higher, this is still my first time grabbing the crystal this session though
ah i see
you're really close tho. i can see you clearing this soon
ye soon
how did you die like that
let go of left?
let go of left arrow prematurely
I gotta let go at the right spot to jump right
that  m jump setup is annoying
bruhhh
gotta be at the right pixel then same frame jump
the jump to get the crystal also requires a same frame jump
one thing I learnt about the super fs is the only way to get them right is to commit
don't be scared, commit
if you die, you die
if you don't commit you often fail it
using this philosophy is how I beat the first super f seven times in a row in jtool today
I only have to succeed at the second super f once to finish
but the first super fI have to be consistently capable of doing
daaang oh well lol
rip
wow that was a really fast crystal grab compared to normal
like 30 minutes
or so
you are getting there much more often
this is the most frequent I've ever made it, rn
genesi2Cool
I died on final super f again with crystal genesis LUL
meh
on the other hand
I am now getting better at the crystal corridor by a significant degree it seems
same with first super f in general
you sure do
the clear is defo close
if not today, then probably tomorrow
pretty much yea
been grinding it nearly every day so it's to be expected really
just not on stream on most days lol
worth stream now tho cause I'm actually close
that jump is so hard
it's fine tho lol
should've stuttered it lol
it's hard to know whether you need to stutter it or not but you can kind of tell
NOOO
it's fine, it wasn't at the super fs LUL
did you know one run I got the crystal then ran into the disappearing trap spike
that was so annoying lol
wasn't today
don't remember what day it was
I don't think I'm getting further tonight, I've already ramped down too much
as in saw the skill decline from too long lol
GLHF!
o hhey ty :D
elcoch8Wow
I almost beat ex air crystal but sadly not
Ahhh
It will happen
had one attempt at final super f lol
You're one Super F away lol
Exactly
tbh the fact I could grind it for 4 hours before decline in skill was massive
back to k3
well now right now as I just finished my 4 hour session on it and nearly cleared ex air crystal once
but yes :)
clear soon
tomorrow for sure unless I randomly do bad
very cathartic to play needle that's fun and not too hard after doing ex air all day lol
did you get the crystal?
GG
ty! :D
niiiiice
that was a MASSIVE speed up on clear time
my last 100% clear of this was 1187 deaths, 3 hours 15 minutes 2 seconds
getting 406 deaths, 1 hour 32 minutes 34 seconds is huge
really good timesave
yee
i had a jump like that in i wanna be the vandal before too lmao
lmao
I sadly did not get the crystal tonight so I decided to play this cause I still felt like iwbtg
lmao
makes sense
good to avoid burnout
yeee
have you played vandal before?
yeah, I've beaten it
speedrun it Cinheimer
lmao
I might some day
That said I think I'm done tonight now, nearly 7 hours is a long session XD
yeah honestly i was surprised to still see you live lol
yeah I'm normally not still live this long XD
unless I'm on a long speedrun haha
do you normally speedrun fangames or just occasionally?
used to be normally, but been on hard grinds instead lately
I ran gaze at the horizon, timemachine 2 lunatic
as my main ones lmao
ah
I did use to run "end my growth"
i've only done runs on boshy and vandal
fair :o
I haven't beaten boshy yet, not really felt the need/wish to - but I may some day.
boshy i cant really bring up cause i mash really slow
but im working towards sub 1 hour vandal atm
also same, my mash speed isn't good enough for boshy lol
any boss with mashing I just play longer than people are intended to fight them for
@Eradem you could def beat it easy, but the physics are gonna feel weird at first
maybe, the boss mashing is a problem tho
@Eradem same here
I think that's where I'd get stuck a lot
i like k3 cause it doesn't require mashing
truuuue
when i get stuck, i know it's my fault skill wise and not because i cant shoot fast enough to go thru 3 cycles of a boss lmao
lmao
